mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.clear_log_payment_estimation_sid, t.pay_bill_sid, t.pay_bill_code, t.vendor_sid, t.vendor_code, t3.short_name AS vendor_name, t.company_sid, t.company_code, t2.short_name AS company_name, t.book_payment_estimation_sid, t.book_payment_estimation_code, t.is_tuihuo, t.book_payment_estimation_item_sid, t.shengxiao_status, t.currency_amount_tax, t.remark, t.creator_account, t7.nick_name AS creator_account_name, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.data_source_sys, t8.inventory_document_code, t4.material_code, t4.material_name, t5.sku_name AS sku1Name, t6.sku_name AS sku2Name from s_fin_clear_log_payment_estimation t LEFT JOIN s_fin_book_payment_estimation_item t1 ON t.book_payment_estimation_item_sid = t1.book_payment_estimation_item_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company t2 ON t.company_sid = t2.company_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t3 ON t.vendor_sid = t3.vendor_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_material t4 ON t1.material_sid = t4.material_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_sku t5 ON t1.sku1_sid = t5.sku_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_sku t6 ON t1.sku2_sid = t6.sku_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t7 ON t.creator_account = t7.user_name AND t.client_id = t7.client_id LEFT JOIN s_inv_inventory_document t8 ON t1.refer_doc_sid = t8.inventory_document_sid
mapper.select: where t.clear_log_payment_estimation_sid = #{clearLogPaymentEstimationSid} ORDER BY t.create_date DESC, t8.inventory_document_code DESC
